title: The pringles stupidity
body:
Seriously, I have a less of a chance of getting a legacy skin in lol than getting 1000 euros from lottery. And some people will most likely go and buy 100 pringles cans because they think they can win XD This is probably the most stupid thing you have ever done. I mean c'mon, Turkey had those stupid coca cola bottles that all gave a free hextech chest, and all Europe gets is another form of gambling? Rito 10/10. No one buy those pringles cans unless you just wanna buy it for those delicious chips
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
